text: citizenM Paris Gare de Lyon provided excellent basic lodging for us (married couple) who did not intend to spend much time in the hotel room other than to sleep and shower. The room was clean and the bed extremely comfortable. The location, while in a more busy section of Paris, was convenient for taking the Metro either from Gare de Lyon or Gare d'Austerlitz. Surprisingly, the hotel was extremely quiet, considering the amount of traffic outside. It was the most quiet hotel that I have ever stayed in. The staff were friendly and helpful.

Our family of 2 boys stayed in 2 rooms. It worked really well - air con works, bed comfy, clean, tech works, showers good. Small rooms but the Communal spaces are good. In the worse heat of summer this place was a saviour for us! Would recommend to other families but you defo need 1 room per child / parent.

This is a fabulous spot to stay in the 12e arrondisement. Smartly designed rooms; excellent food and drink services; top notch wifi and workspaces; ultra-friendly, multilingual staff. The hotel's proximity to Gare d'Lyon opens many options for train and metro travel, too. Easy to navigate to/from CDG airport. For business travelers: you couldn't pick a better spot in Paris.

Modern, clean and comfortable tech forward hotel conveniently located next to Gare de Lyon and a short walk from Gare dâAusterlitz. |Close to most Paris attractions and neighborhoods. |Friendly accommodating staff. Very helpful if the techie stuff gets a bit confusing.|Hearty and tasty breakfast buffet. Common lounge areas and workspaces.

We had CD an exceptional stay and would definitely recommend this hotel to o friends when in Paris. Service was great, close to Metro and train lines for easy travel through the city and room size was very comfortable
Super convenient location, able to choose a quiet floor, felt very safe and comfortable, staff very helpful. Would stay here again and at other locations.

I did not like how small the room is. They told you that the room has ironing facilities. That is not true; there is an ironing room on the floor but not in the room. I asked for a kettle and could not get it. I have a baby and needed to prepare milk for her. I needed hot water.  The iconic view from my room was catastrophic and not iconic. I asked FranÃ§ois for a better room and even chatted to a staff via booking.com but nothing doing. No follow up was made on the matter. When we checked in, no valet services were provided, we had to take our luggage to our room by ourselves. It is not easy after a 13 hours flight. The laundry service (outsourced) is just a scam in my opinion.  The staff doesn't speak FRENCH. I ASKED FRANCOIS AND HE SAID NO.

Fijn hotel met een ruime kamer en een goed bed. Ook de regendouche en het toilet waren fijn. De sfeerverlichting met behulp van de ipad was leuk. Ik had graag nog een waterkoker op de kamer gezien maar verder was alles leuk ingericht en was het een fijn verblijf. De locatie is superhandig op een steenworp afstand van Gare de Lyon. Wij hadden een upgrade voor een kamer met mooi uitzicht. Jammer dat de ramen zo vuil waren dat je er nauwelijks door kon kijken. Het leek alsof het de hele dag mistig was. Evengoed hebben we genoten van ons verblijf. De kamer was fijn en er was een heerlijk ontbijt. Bij een volgend bezoek komen we graag weer.

Er hing een constante vieze geur in het hotel (ingang, lobby, gangen). Hele hotel kwam smoezelig en verouderd over en ook in de gemeenschappelijke ruimte hing een onprettige vibe door andere gasten waarvan ik me afvraag of dit wel hotelgasten van CitizenM waren. De kamer was net zo smoezelig, waardoor je de hele tijd de behoefte had om je schoenen aan te houden. Zonde, locatie voor het hotel is prima zo vlak naast Gare de Lyon, ondanks dat de omgeving niet direct inspirerend is te noemen. Er zit geen verschil tussen het uitzicht op kantoren of Rue van Gogh, bij beiden kijk je uit op een pand in aanbouw.

Dit hotel in november 2022 bezocht voor ons 6 jaar samen zijn. Kwaliteit van kamer, service en gemeenschappelijke ruimtes zoals altijd uitstekend. Als je boekt bij CitizenM weet je dat het altijd meer dan goed gaat zijn. Tevens had ik in de rooftopbar, CloudM, een huwelijksaanzoek gepland. Ik wil Aisha, Jel, team van de receptie en team 'finally' nogmaals hartelijk danken voor hun medewerking, hulp, vriendelijkheid en enthousiasme. In het bijzonder Jel voor haar inzet tijdens het aanzoek. Als je iets bijzonders wilt plannen moet je zeker hier zijn. CloudM biedt prachtig uitzicht over parijs en de Eiffeltoren. We zullen dit verblijf nooit meer vergeten. Zoek op YouTube naar Mommy.of.Bobbi voor een video van het hotel.

CitizenM Paris Gare de Lyon offers much of what I have come to appreciate about the brand: thoughtful design, genuinely friendly service, and clever use of space. My stay here delivered a strong overall experience with some standout highlights, though it did not begin without its hiccups.||||Booking Experience: Appreciated Transparency After Pricing Drop||||As someone who works in the travel industry, I am fully aware of dynamic pricing strategies. Still, I was surprised when the nightly rate for my room dropped dramatically on the day of arrival by more than would usually be expected even for a last minute rate shift. It admittedly left a bit of a sour taste, especially after booking well in advance.||||To their credit, the hotel team handled it brilliantly. Upon arrival, the staff and the on duty manager graciously allowed me to cancel and rebook the same room on the spot at the new lower rate. Their flexibility and professionalism turned what could have been a frustrating moment into a positive one, and I am very grateful for their help.||||Room and View: Cozy with a Parisian Postcard Backdrop||||My room followed the typical citizenM template: compact, efficient, and tech forward, with all controls accessible via a tablet or the mobile app. The oversized bed was just as comfortable as I have come to expect, and everything was immaculate.||||What made this stay especially memorable was the view. I had a picture perfect window overlooking the Paris skyline, with the Eiffel Tower sparkling in the distance each night. It was a small luxury that added a real sense of place and made the stay feel special.||||On this trip, we were also celebrating my partnerâs birthday, and the hotel surprised us with a thoughtful handwritten card. That personal touch was very much appreciated and speaks volumes about the care and attention the staff provide.||||Facilities and Public Spaces: Stylish and Well Kept||||Unlike some of the older citizenM locations, this property still feels fresh and well maintained. The design throughout the public spaces was sleek and vibrant with the kind of atmosphere that encourages both solo relaxation and social interaction. Everything felt clean, well kept, and in working order.||||The rooftop bar was a lovely surprise: stylish and offering panoramic views across Paris. While fully enclosed so do not expect a terrace, it is still a great space to enjoy a drink and soak in the skyline. The ambience leans more quiet lounge than buzzing cocktail bar, which suited me just fine.||||Service: Truly a Standout||||As always with citizenM, the staff or âambassadorsâ were one of the best parts of the experience. Warm, engaging, and genuinely helpful, they managed to make every interaction feel personal without ever being intrusive. Whether helping me rebook at check in or offering advice on the local area, their hospitality was top notch.||||Location: Excellent Connections but a Bit Gritty After Dark||||The hotelâs location right next to Gare de Lyon is ideal for travelers arriving by train or wanting quick access to the metro. From here, it is incredibly easy to get to just about anywhere in the city. That said, the surrounding area, while busy and practical by day, can feel a bit rough around the edges at night. It is worth being mindful if you are returning late.||||Final Thoughts: Great Stay with a Strong Recovery||||CitizenM Paris Gare de Lyon delivered exactly the kind of experience I associate with the brand: comfortable, efficient, and warm, all in a stylish package. While the dynamic pricing stumble at the beginning threw me off, the way the staff handled it turned things around completely. Combined with a memorable view, friendly service, and a well kept property, the stay turned out to be a highlight.||||If you are a fan of the citizenM experience or simply looking for a well located modern hotel with excellent transport links and a human touch, this property is absolutely worth considering. I will happily return, especially for that Eiffel Tower view.

citizenM Paris Gare de Lyon provided excellent basic lodging for us (married couple) who did not intend to spend much time in the hotel room other than to sleep and shower. The room was clean and the bed extremely comfortable. The location, while in a more busy section of Paris, was convenient for taking the Metro either from Gare de Lyon or Gare d'Austerlitz. Surprisingly, the hotel was extremely quiet, considering the amount of traffic outside. It was the most quiet hotel that I have ever stayed in. The staff were friendly and helpful.

Our family of 2 boys stayed in 2 rooms. It worked really well - air con works, bed comfy, clean, tech works, showers good. Small rooms but the Communal spaces are good. In the worse heat of summer this place was a saviour for us! Would recommend to other families but you defo need 1 room per child / parent.

This is a fabulous spot to stay in the 12e arrondisement. Smartly designed rooms; excellent food and drink services; top notch wifi and workspaces; ultra-friendly, multilingual staff. The hotel's proximity to Gare d'Lyon opens many options for train and metro travel, too. Easy to navigate to/from CDG airport. For business travelers: you couldn't pick a better spot in Paris.
